infos.value: Crafting is a type of smithing that allows anyone to forge equipment—even if they lack the expertise—so long as the materials are combined correctly.
I have prepared the necessary materials as usual, so go ahead and use them.
Congratulations! You have crafted some wonderful equipment. Let us continue by enhancing it.
Next, let us enhance your equipment.
Your equipment has reached its maximum enhancement level! You can now awaken your equipment to strengthen it further.
I would love for you to use this equipment regularly, Lord Mont. Let us register it to your Favorite Equipment.
With this, Lord Mont, Auto Formation and other similar functions will prioritize equipping you with this piece of equipment before you embark.
The strength of equipment lies not only in its attack power and magic power, but also in the various additional effects and abilities it possesses.
Crafting, enhancing, and awakening equipment to its peak will greatly aid you as you brave the battlefront.
• Crafting Equipment •
A <color=#00ffff>recipe</color> explains how to craft equipment. If you have the listed <color=#00ffff>materials</color> prepared, you can <color=#00ffff>craft</color> the equipment.
• Crafting Equipment II •

Recipes <color=#00ffff>disappear</color> once the item has been crafted. If you wish to <color=#00ffff>craft the same equipment item again</color>, you must <color=#00ffff>acquire another recipe</color>.
• Enhancing Equipment •
Let us try combining <color=#00ffff>Adamantite</color> with your base equipment.
• Awakening •
<color=#00ffff>Awakening</color> equipment raises its <color=#00ffff>level cap</color> while also <color=#00ffff>enhancing</color> its <color=#00ffff>additional abilities</color>.
• Awakening II •
Though awakening requires certain <color=#00ffff>items</color>, the strength gained corresponds to the items used.
• Awakening III •
Awakening equipment raises its <color=#00ffff>level cap</color> while also <color=#00ffff>enhancing</color> its <color=#00ffff>additional abilities</color>.
• Favorite Equipment •
If you register an equipment item to your <color=#00ffff>Favorite Equipment</color>, it can be <color=#00ffff>automatically equipped</color> during the Unit Formation and Auto Formation phases.
• Equipment Proficiency •
Sufficient <color=#00ffff>equipment proficiency</color> is required in order to draw out the inherent stats of equipment items.
• Equipment Proficiency •
A unit's equipment proficiency increases in rank when you <color=#00ffff>equip them with items</color> and <color=#00ffff>deploy them to clear quests</color>.
• Insufficient Equipment Proficiency •

In order to <color=#00ffff>manifest your equipment's true potential</color>, you must <color=#00ffff>equip it and engage in battle</color>, which will help you attain the appropriate <color=#00ffff>equipment proficiency</color>.
• Equipment + Values •
The <color=#00ffff>higher the + value</color> connected to the equipment's name, the <color=#00ffff>higher its stat caps will be</color>.
